actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 23, 1975, making appropriations for special assistance to refugees from Cambodia and Vietnam for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Permits appropriations for the Departments of State and the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare made for special assistance to refugees from Cambodia and Vietnam to be expended for such assistance to refugees from Laos as well.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of May 23, 1975, making appropriations for special assistance to refugees from Cambodia and Vietnam for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
